IntensityCueManager Class Reference

ICM class wraps the process of computing an intensity cue from an image. IntensityCueManager provides utilities for receiving a mono8 frame, computing a Cue from it using the method defined in constructing it, then publishing the Cue information to a pre-determined topic. More...

Detailed Description

ICM class wraps the process of computing an intensity cue from an image. IntensityCueManager provides utilities for receiving a mono8 frame, computing a Cue from it using the method defined in constructing it, then publishing the Cue information to a pre-determined topic.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

IntensityCueManager::IntensityCueManager ( ros::NodeHandle  n,
const std::string  sub_topic,
const std::string  pub_topic,
const std::string  method,
const bool  video 
)

Constructor.

Parameters
nThe ROS node handle required to initialise the pub/sub infrastructure.
sub_topicThe ROS topic to which the manager should subscribe.
pub_topicThe ROS topic to which the manager will publish cue info.
methodThe method the manager should use to compute the cue from the image.
videoIndicates whether we want to display the video frames on screen.
